author: Alan White
title: Watch This Medical Expert Give A Perfect Explanation Of Why You Should Stay At Home Right Now
description: "If you are irresponsible enough to think that you don't mind if you don't get the flu, remember it's not about you, it's about everybody else."
content: Normal flu, if I get that, it's going to infect, on average, about 1.3, 1.4 people. OK? If there was such a division. And if those 1.3, 1.4 people gave it to the next lot, that's the second time it gets passed on. By the time that happens 10 times, I've been … [+1796 chars]
